text: Soni (kumbuchilani) katema kaŵakopwesye Ambuje ŵenu mu ŵanache ŵa Adam kuumila m’migongo jao ŵanache ŵao (ŵane kuumila m’migongo ja ŵane muchachiŵelekanilana, soni wosope nikwakoposya mun'gongo wa Adam), ni kwatendekasya kuŵa mboni syakulitendela achimisyene (yakunda Tauhidi, pakwatenda kuti): “Ana nganimba Nam'mbuje gwenu?” Ŵanganyao ŵatite: “Elo! Tuteendeele umboni (kuti Mmwejo ni Ambuje ŵetu).” Ntaakwiisa kuŵecheta lisiku lya Kiyama yanti: “Chisimu uwwe pangali chatwachimaanyi chakwayana ni yele (ya Tauhidiyi).”
